channel.title: How do i solve this problem?
channel.description:
im trying to make romeo and juliet talk. like for example the starting loaction (varrock) i have romeo yell out loud where is juliet? and when the player finds juliet i want the player to have a choice did romeo send you to find me? *yes *no and so on
any help?

item.title: How do i solve this problem?
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

umm same error?

src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:104: sendNpcChat4(java.lang.String
,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,int,java.lang.String) in ser
ver.model.players.DialogueHandler cannot be applied to (java.lang.String,int,jav
a.lang.String)
sendNpcChat4(“Did Romeo send you to find me?”, c.talking
Npc, “Juliet”);
^
src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:108: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sendoption2(java.lang.String,java.lang.String)
location: class server.model.players.DialogueHandler
sendoption2(“yes”, “No”);
^
src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:112: sendNpcChat2(java.lang.String
,java.lang.String,int,java.lang.String) in server.model.players.DialogueHandler
cannot be applied to (java.lang.String,java.lang.String)
sendNpcChat2(“I don’t want to hear anything about him an
ymore!”, “leave me alone!”);
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

u still didnt fix it.

sendNpcChat4(“Did Romeo send you to find me?”, c.talkingNpc, “Juliet”);

sendNpcChat2(“Ewww i hate that fool!”, “leave me alone!”);

see the difrend?

item.title: How do i solve this problem?
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

alrite i fixed it this is now what it looks like and same error still pops up
case 24:
sendNpcChat2(“Did Romeo send you to find me?”, c.talkingNpc, “Juliet”);
c.nextChat = 25;
break;
case 25:
sendoption2(“yes”, “No”);
c.nextChat = 26;
break;
case 26:
sendNpcChat2(“Ewww i hate that fool!”, “leave me alone!”);
break;

item.title: How do i solve this problem?
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

i found a guide on this site but its wayyy to damn diffcult for me to understand anything… i had no fucking idea what he meant. i mean for real look at this shit and tell me what it mean… http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=490227.0

ok but anyways i tried to figure it out by myself and this is what i have put under diagloue handler.java
case 24:
sendNpcChat4(“Did Romeo send you to find me?”, c.talkingNpc, “Juliet”);
c.nextChat = 25;
break;
case 25:
sendoption2(“yes”, “No”);
c.nextChat = 26;
break;
case 26:
sendNpcChat4(“Ewww i hate that fool! leave me alone!”);
break;

and i get this errror when i tried to compile it…

src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:104: sendNpcChat4(java.lang.String
,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,int,java.lang.String) in ser
ver.model.players.DialogueHandler cannot be applied to (java.lang.String,int,jav
a.lang.String)
sendNpcChat4(“Did Romeo send you to find me?”, c.talking
Npc, “Juliet”);
^
src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:108: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sendoption2(java.lang.String,java.lang.String)
location: class server.model.players.DialogueHandler
sendoption2(“yes”, “No”);
^
src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:112: sendNpcChat4(java.lang.String
,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,int,java.lang.String) in ser
ver.model.players.DialogueHandler cannot be applied to (java.lang.String)
sendNpcChat4(“Ewww i hate that fool! leave me alone!”);
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

what did i do wrong?

and thanks for liking my site
